title: Human Health Tracker
description:
💗 Human Health: Your chronic & mental health symptom tracker & treatments Reminder

🗒️ Track Symptoms, Medications & Treatments Easily 
Human Health is the ultimate app for tracking symptoms, medications, & treatments to better understand how yours, or a loved one’s health is changing over time. Designed with input from patients, parents, & medical experts from top US universities, Human Health helps manage everyday health concerns & complex chronic health issues, including mental health, neurological, pain, & autoimmune issues.

Key Features:
🤒 SYMPTOM TRACKER 
Use our symptom tracker to monitor & understand the impact of your symptoms. Add your conditions & receive symptom-tracking recommendations from our database of over 1,000 symptoms.

📙 SYMPTOM TRACKER JOURNAL 
Keep a detailed symptom diary as you track your symptoms, so you never miss important details about your symptoms or any other health details you want to remember.

💊 TREATMENTS TRACKER & MEDICATIONS REMINDER 
Log all types of treatments & set custom medication reminders. Our database includes over 100,000 treatments from medications & supplements to lifestyle changes & devices.

📈 PERSONALIZED HEALTH INSIGHTS 
Gain insights into trends & patterns in your symptoms & treatments. Explore common symptoms , treatments & medications experienced by people similar to you.

👨‍👨‍👦‍👦 FOR PARENTS & CARERS 
Create multiple profiles so you can track symptoms,  medications & treatments for yourself & those you care for.

🏥 EXPORT A PDF REPORT OF YOUR SYMPTOMS & TREATMENTS 
Export the information you’ve collected in your symptom tracker & treatments reminder into a report to give to your medical team, so you can better advocate in your next appointment. 

🌿 COMING SOON 
Upload medical records to your health timeline
Add test results, vaccinations, & surgeries.

🔒 OUR PRIVACY PROMISE 
- Control who can view your data. 
- Data encryption & secure storage. 
- Your personal data will never be sold. Delete your data anytime.
For more information: https://humanhealth.zendesk.com/hc/en-us
Privacy policy: https://humanhealth.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/17643897206681-Our-Privacy-Policy

For more support: support@human.health

Any insights provided by Human Health do not constitute medical advice. Remember to always consult your doctor before making any medical decisions.
